i cant even write about my day if it includes mentioning anything about any dude i talk to.! this stupid fuckin bitch that reads my journal for some reason is tell the dudes i mention in here that im talkin bad about them in my journal. which is really fuckin stupid cuz the dudes could just read my journal and see that im not saying anything bad about them! i wanna start a new journal but i dont want that person to find out what it is! god damn! this really is fucked up! i mean i dont mind ppl reading my journal even if i dont like them, but then when they start this shit its just no.! Anyways i want over to my soon to be new house, n one of my soon to be new negihbor(not Tim) always comes over everything we r there. N he smells very bad and im not tryin to be mean nor am i the first on that said that. but he needs to gett in to shower and we dont no how to tell him without sounding mean or hurting his feelings. SO i hope he doesnt plain on being at our house all the time cuz I WILL DIE! i was tryin to eat some of my cake n it was very hard with the smell! I feel so bad right now but its the truth. Also my step-bro Joe stop over there yesterday to say Happy b-day and he gave me a hug. n the neighbor that smell his name is bradley btw, well he saw that so today bradley came over and gave me a hug, and then he was like kissing my neck n was sayin how "beautiful" i was and sayin "happy b-day" im like WTF get the hell off me! but i didnt say that but i was so fucking scared. OMG! it was FREAKY! MAJOR! n the smell omg! then he gave me another short hug (thank bob) but michelle(tims g/f) saw it n my g-ma told her i dont like that. so Michelle told Tim and Tim told Bradley to not hug me. (tim doesnt no he kissed my next the first time) so now bradley comes up and says how he means no harm he told me about 20times im like OK i get it! but tim is going to tell him that he cant be over there all the time. THANK BOB FOR TIM!  n some1 needs to tell him to get in the shower n FAST!!! OMG! i feel so bad but its the truth! this guy smells so horrible it gives u a headache and makes u wanna barf all over its sick! omg! he needs a shower. i hope tim will tell him to shower to.i swear i will lock my self in my room when he comes over! OMG ITS HORRIBLE! i just wanna hand him a bar of soap so bad. i was tryin everything to get him to leave.! gr it was horrible.

anyways i have to go now cuz i gotta wake at 10 cuz Tim is taking my to the Cingular store cuz my phone is stupid and the guy told me that i had to go the Eylria store for a new phone cuz they were out and tim thinks thats not right so yeah. i must go!

Dudes n Dudettes! my dad actually defined me over Kim for the first time EVER on sunday ( yeah i kno im late) but they got in another fight and broke up and he told Kim that i wanted my necklaces back, and she said Kristen didnt have them, then Kristen said she had them n she was going to give them back but she didnt want to get bitched out and she was cryin and shit  and said she took them becuz i always made fun of her ! ok that is just a great fuckin reason to steal my shit huh? and then my dad told kim that they should not have been in my room anyways and kim took my Joe Boxer shorts that i havent got back but i got my necklaces back. n he told kim that takin my shorts was childish n kim was like why r u defindin her he said "what i cant defined my own daughter now! i guess she was like u dont defined me when see calls me names(which he does he always takes her side) and he said u call her a slut so what the differences! .Kristen called me Anorixic(sp?) and she says i make fun of her wtf does she consider that ! Its not my fault she is a Hippo and im not. she should give the Fork a rest maybe she wont be as big as a hippo.  Kim told my uncle that she gave me back my necklaces since they get blamed for everything else! WTF! they had no right takin my necklaces or my shorts. SHE IS FUCKIN STUPID! she says her and her kids r perfect and dont do nothing wrong WTF do they consider that! but of course my dad is back with her! he is seriously fucked in the head! HE PISSES ME OFF! but i stilll cant believe  he took my side!

Warped was AWESOME! we saw the casualties first, and we walk around and bought stuff. Then we saw the lead singer of the casualties so we stalked him and got his autograph ( we also saw another member but we didnt get his autograph) After that Jessica found out the Lars was signing at 330 so we get his autograph too. We saw some of Yellowcard and Sugarcult, and we saw all of Story of the Year and 2 mosh pits broke out next to us. Then we sat till 6 and then want and saw New Found Glory WHICH WAS AWESOME! Jordan is so HOTT! we were in the front but on the side of them. Then for Lars, Anti-flag, Flogging Molly,n 2 mins of Taking Back Sunday we were all the way in the front right next to like 20 speakers. My ears are still sorta ringing. Anti-flag was awesome too.but WOW i saw Jordan! i took like 15 pics of him! YAY! IT WAS GREAT!

I got my phone yesterday...well i was out gettin my phone kim and my dad were at my house, kim i guess went in my room and she unplugged my cd player OK? big honkin WOOP she unplugged my cd players! holy shit ... it was a living hell tryin to plug it back in. that was the stupidest shit ive ever seen. but i havent found anything missing YET.

Well my phone was working fine yesterday  cuz i was talkin to Zack on it, but then this morning i tryed callin it from my house phone and it would not ring so i took it back to the store and it turns out that u have to dial the area code so anyone who has my number already u have to dial 216 ok i dont kno why though.BUT U HAVE TO! or ur call will not come through to me! And i could not firgure out how to turn it off and neither could my uncle so it wasnt just me... it turns out the button is at the top of the phone (im use to holdin downt the end button to turn off a phone) so i was like WOW that is amazing! it doesnt even look like a button. Thats all for now.

Only one more day after midnight! YAY! I sure hope 2morrow goes by fast.

Im going to have to make a cut cuz of all the shit that has happened today it would take up to much room...


Ok first of all we (nicholas and I) were moving boxes to the car and then we took them to the new house to unload and when we came back to get more, Kim and her FAT daughter was there, her fucked in the head son, and some little boy they were watching(who would let then watch there kids i dont kno) and my asshole father and my sis. then my brother(nicholas) mom showed up to pick them up but Brittany(sis) want to stay with Kim (WHO THE HELL KNOWS WHY) so i had to put more boxes in the car by myself which i didnt mind... but then kim decides to sit on the porch step and then tells her son to sit next to her so i have to fuckin squeeze through with heavy as fuck boxes and carry them all the way out to the street cuz she wont move her fuckin van out of the driveway.BITCH! so when i was finally done we went to the new house and unload, then went the store then to get some food. and we were going to come home and eat if the BITCH was gone but they were still there so we want back over by are new house to eat, but then Tim tells us that my uncle is lookin for us,so we had to go back over to the house, so we did and when we were pullin up i noticed a necklace around Kristens(kims fat daughter) and she hadnt had a necklace on earlier, then when i want on the house so did not have it on no more. so i want up stairs and all 3 of my necklaces are gone, i was ready to fuckin kill someone. so i went and told my uncle and he went in the house and confronted her but she said she didnt take it and kim said tell her to look harder cuz her room is a mess... that says right there that they were in my room cuz how the hell would they no that my room was a mess unless they were in there and plus when i want up there to check for my necklaces the door was opened and i had closed it.so i was searchin my room so more n never found them, then i went back outside to the car and my g-ma told my uncle that Justin(kims fucked in the head son) had ran past the car and said "u big fat liar" so my uncle said something to him and he of course said "i didnt say that"so then Kristen was out by the van and see heard it and ran in and told her mom and then screamed out the door that "u guys need to stop lying" and i said "Shut the fuck up bitch" and she like "u shut up u little slut" and i was like " me the slut look what the fuck u are wearin u fat ass"( she had on some SHORT ASS SHORT and a tank shirt) and im not lying she is as big as a HIPPO!so anyways she said something esle im not sure what cuz i was just like"SHUT THE FUCK UP" so her mom started to come out and my uncle said to get leave so we did and kristen was like "james(which is my dad) do something say something to her" and we were pullin away and i was like "i dare u to say something to me" then we went over to the new house and i was in tears! then shortly after my uncle shows and was like "kim told james to come over and tell u off or he cant live with her" and i guess my uncle said "u better not show or say shit to her cuz i will beat ur ass" so they came and sat around the block and then my dad come up and they were all agruing at one point Tim stepped to my dad and i was right there i backed up real fast and i was screamin at my dad that i wanted my necklaces and he said " ill get them back" i was like "yeah right u let her call me a Slut and kim why the hell would u get my necklaces back" then kim called the Police AGAIN! which was stupid ass fuck cuz her daughter stole my stuff and thet had came over to us and Tim as had problems with her b4 and she said to the police "we came over to talk to someone that has been harassin us" DAMN SHE is fuckin stupid.but anyways they left shortly after and the police never came. so when we finally want back home they were still there so we had to wait for them to leave and my dad come over and tryed to started talkin all nice to my g-ma WTF? and i told him i want my stuff back and he was like u r my daughter i will get it back. im like WOW u actully remember that im ur daughter! so yeah it was a really fucked up day and I never did get my necklaces! i m so fuckin pissed!

The only good thing about today is im getting a Cell phone tommorrow morning b4 my uncle comes over to start moving some more stuff.

(no blood-thristy Corporations)" "A new kind of Army" if u want to kno anymore just let me know.

On saturday when i was workin at the medieval faire this kid killed a slug and then "buried" it with his shoe" and i started screaming at him "the poor slug never did anything to u. what if someone came and just killed u and buried u with there shoe?" I was so PISSED! ITS JUST NOT RIGHT!
then today in the yard my sister was walkin on a piece of wood and saw a spider and started screamin and ran across the yard, i like "wtf?" she was like "there was something brown moving." so i went and looked it was a harmless little spider and she was like "kill it" and was screamig, nearly in tears and jumping up and down, i said "no its all the way over her on the other side of the yard its not going to do anything to u, im standin right here by it and its not doing anything" and she was still like "kill it" i said "no" and it went under the fence and that ended that..

Anti-flag - "911 for peace"
It's in the paper every day
You see it in the headlines and you feel so sick
As another life leaves this world -this world so full of hate - but short
Short on compassion, short on humanity
Asking myself in vain, shaken by the shock
"do we even have a chance?"
Chorus-I don't want to die (i dont want to kill)
I dont want to kill (i dont want to die)
We are all human i; its time to prove it!
This is a plea for peace, world peace
To the oppressore of the world, and to
To the leaders of the nations, Corporate profit takers
To the every day citizen
GREED, ENVY, FEAR, HATE - the competition has to stop
When you see someone down- now's the time to pick'em up
Set our differences aside and never look back!
Chorus (repeat);
Isn't everybody tired of the fighting?
Isn't everyone tired of the killing?
Isn't everyone tired of the dying?
Isn't everyone tired of the Hatred?
Violence?
Fighting!
Killing!
Dying!
*Excerpt from Dr. Martin Luther King's "I have a dream speech"

today was byfar on of the worst days ever.

i had to wake up at 8 cuz i had to work the Medieval Faire. The morning shift was really slow, so we didnt do much, and that part of the day was fine, i got fairy dusted and i bought a hair wrap! YAY! and my peachberry wine... that is good stuff. (non-alcoholic, unfortunatley) but that part of the day was fine.

then....

we want back to Megans and we were suppose to go to the brookpark carnival, but Megan got in trouble so i had to leave. then she was aloud. (wtf?) but anyways so we want up there and i saw the kid im like obsessed with (kinda) GR! i cant say anything bout that in here. i wish i had someone to talk to. i wanted to try and talk to him, but megan had to go meet joe i was very pissed. and when we got back i could not find him (tear) then i had to go watch the fireworks and joe wanted to sit in the front really close to the fireworks(BITCH)and so we had ashes all over us, well not all over but they were flying around everywhere and one got in my eye... and it will not come out. i have tryed everything, i tried to get it out with my finger, water, crying, nothing will work , im afarid to go to sleep. and on the way home my vision in that eye went blurry... so i dont kno what to do. plus my g-ma is mad at my cuz i had her pick me up and she was watchin the fireworks from my aunts and i was suppose to go to my aunts right after, but i didnt cuz i wanted to find SOMEONE!(that i never found :'( ) so when i finally did leave at 11 she had sent my cousin to look for me so yeah. she was bitchin the whole ride home... this day was really screwed up and not right and gr! man why do i have to  like this person so much! its just not right! man i wish he could understand! GRRRRRRR!!!!! i wish he knew how if felt!  i feel like crying so hard! this is not right! I HATE GUYS (MOST) AT THIS MOMENT!
